<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user wants me to modify the HTML mockup. Looking at the current implementation:

1. **Title icons in collapsible sections** - Currently they have gradient backgrounds (e.g., `bg-gradient-to-br from-pink-500 via-purple-500 to-blue-500`). User wants them simple and white without border or background.

2. **Collapsible sections and sidebar panels** - Currently using `bg-gray-800/50`. Need more contrast against the `bg-gray-900` sidebar background.

3. **Token chain UI** - Currently uses colored lines with circles (the `absolute left-2 top-2 bottom-0 w-0.5 bg-gradient-to-b` and `rounded-full` circles). User says it looks janky and wants a better visualization.

4. **Move "Resolved value" section** - Currently at the bottom of the token chain. Need to move it between "Text Heading" (which appears to be the "Button Primary" selected element section) and "Token Chain" sections.

Let me make these changes:

1. For icons - remove the gradient backgrounds and just have white icons
2. For panels - increase contrast with darker or more distinct backgrounds  
3. For token chain - create a cleaner, more elegant visualization
4. Reorder sections in the right panel

Let me update the HTML file with these improvements.</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The changes look good. The HTML file has been updated with:

1. **Simplified icons** - The icons in collapsible sections are now simple white SVGs without gradient backgrounds
2. **Improved contrast** - Sections now use `bg-gray-800` with `border border-gray-700/50` to stand out against the `bg-gray-900` sidebar
3. **Redesigned token chain** - Using clean cards with colored left borders and simple arrow connectors instead of the janky circles and lines

The changes are complete and the file is properly formatted.</details></think>

---

All the improvements have been made to the mockup. Here's a summary of the changes:

### Changes Made:

1. **Simplified title icons** - Removed the gradient backgrounds from collapsible section headers. Icons are now simple white stroked SVGs directly in the button, without any wrapping div or background.

2. **Improved panel contrast** - Changed sections from `bg-gray-800/50` to solid `bg-gray-800` with a subtle `border border-gray-700/50` to make them stand out more against the `bg-gray-900` sidebar.

3. **Redesigned Token Chain UI** - Replaced the janky colored lines and circles with a cleaner design:
   - Each token layer is now a card with a colored left border (emerald for Component, violet for Semantic, blue for Primitive)
   - Simple down-arrow SVG connectors between the cards
   - Cards have a subtle gradient background and hover states
   - Arrow icons on the right side hint at the cascade direction

4. **Reordered sections** - The "Resolved Value" panel is now positioned between "Selected Element" and "Token Chain" as requested.

5. **Added custom CSS** - Added `bg-gray-850` and `hover:bg-gray-750` custom colors for proper nested panel styling.

6. **Updated export footer** - Applied consistent styling with borders and improved spacing.

You can refresh the mockup in your browser to see the cleaner, more polished UI!

{\n    try {\n      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(resolvedValue);\n      setCopied(true);\n      setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);\n    } catch (err) {\n      console.error('Failed to copy:', err);\n    }\n  };\n  \n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"space-y-1\"&gt;\n      &lt;div className=\"text-xs text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider mb-3\"&gt;Token Chain&lt;/div&gt;\n      \n      {/* Chain nodes */}\n      {chain.map((node, index) =&gt;
